DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study twofold : 1 ) test feasibility integrate simple bilateral ear acupuncture procedure ( Auricular Stimulation Procedure - ASP ) standard care deliver Aeromedical Evacuation system 2 ) observe document change pain score in-flight related symptom factor ( e.g . sinus block/pain , ear block pain , nausea/air sickness ) typically monitor transportation wound warrior Ramstein Air Base ( RAB ) Andrews Air Force Base ( AAFB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Feasibility Integrating Ear Acupuncture Into Aeromedical Evacuation System From RAB AAFB
DOC.criteria: Age 18 NRS Pain rating > 0 Military beneficiary undergo aeromedical evacuation RAB AAFB Medically unstable otherwise unable participate include inability consent Allergy metal Ear trauma Sepsis Unhealed wound ear Piercing scar tissue ear acupuncture point area Pregnancy
